items.title: 苹果iPhone 17生产扩展至印度五家工厂 (原标题: Apple's iPhone 17 Manufacturing Expands Across Five Indian Plants)
items.creator: Tim Hardwick
items.summary:
## 苹果在印度扩大iPhone 17生产

苹果公司正加速在印度五家工厂的iPhone生产，以减少对中国制造美国市场设备的依赖。这是其全球供应链多元化战略的一部分。

### iPhone 17首次在印度全面生产

*   据彭博社报道，所有四款iPhone 17型号将首次在印度制造，为下个月的发布做准备。

### 生产设施与关键合作伙伴

*   此次扩张包括塔塔集团在泰米尔纳德邦和富士康在班加罗尔机场附近新投入运营的工厂。
*   塔塔集团旗下的设施预计将在未来两年内处理印度一半的iPhone产量，巩固其作为苹果关键合作伙伴的地位。

### 印度iPhone出口激增

*   印度iPhone出口额显著增长：
    *   今年4月至7月，印度出口了价值75亿美元的iPhone。
    *   相比之下，上一个财年全年出口额为170亿美元。
*   Canalys报告指出，上个月印度已超越中国，成为向美国出货智能手机的主要制造商。

### 生产转移的背景与挑战

*   **美国关税影响**：苹果正在应对特朗普政府带来的关税影响。首席执行官蒂姆·库克最近承诺在四年内在美国投资6000亿美元，部分原因是为了维持印度制造iPhone的关税豁免。尽管特朗普已对印度征收50%的关税，但迄今为止豁免了电子产品。
*   **中国方面的阻碍**：据报道，中国已阻止技术向印度转移。
*   **工程师召回与替代**：富士康已从印度工厂召回数百名中国工程师。苹果据称已用来自台湾和日本的工程师取代他们，但成本更高。

![iphone 16 pro colors 1](https://images.macrumors.com/t/UDuQhYqHXldAG4vwc-czAZfkRo=/400x0/article-new/2024/09/iphone-16-pro-colors-1.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: 苹果正将iPhone 17的生产扩展至印度五家工厂，以降低对中国的依赖。所有四款iPhone 17型号将首次在印度制造。印度iPhone出口额激增，已超越中国成为美国智能手机主要供应商。此举旨在应对美国关税，尽管中国阻碍技术转移，苹果仍通过高成本引入台日工程师推进印度生产。
items.translated_title: 苹果iPhone 17生产扩展至印度五家工厂
items.content:
Apple is ramping up iPhone production in India across five factories as it continues reducing dependence on China for U.S.-bound devices. For the first time, all four iPhone 17 models will be manufactured in India in preparation for launch next month, reports Bloomberg.


The expansion includes newly operational plants from Tata Group in Tamil Nadu and Foxconn near Bangalore airport. Tata-controlled facilities are expected to handle up to half of India's iPhone output over the next two years, cementing the conglomerate's role as a key Apple partner.

iPhone exports from India have surged dramatically. Between April and July, $7.5 billion worth of iPhones shipped from the country, compared to $17 billion for the entire previous fiscal year. Last month, a Canalys report claimed India has overtaken China as the leading manufacturer of smartphones shipped to the United States.

The production shift comes as Apple navigates the impact of tariffs brought by the Trump administration. CEO Tim Cook recently pledged $600 billion in U.S. investments over four years, partly to maintain exemptions for India-made iPhones. Trump has imposed 50% tariffs on India but has so far spared electronics.

China has reportedly discouraged technology transfers to India, and Foxconn has recalled hundreds of Chinese engineers from Indian facilities. Apple is said to have replaced them with engineers from Taiwan and Japan at higher costs.
Tags: Bloomberg, India

items.title: 英国据报道撤回获取加密iCloud用户数据的要求 (原标题: UK Reportedly Withdraws Demand to Access Encrypted iCloud User Data)
items.creator: Tim Hardwick
items.summary:
### 英国撤回iCloud数据访问要求

根据美国情报总监的声明，英国政府已同意撤回其备受争议的、要求访问苹果用户加密iCloud数据的要求。这一进展标志着围绕数据隐私和国家安全之间平衡的长期争论取得了关键性进展。

#### 主要进展

*   **撤回声明**：美国情报总监图尔西·加巴德（Tulsi Gabbard）在X（Twitter）上发帖称，英国已放弃迫使苹果提供后门访问加密数据的计划，她认为这侵犯了美国公民的隐私和公民自由。
*   **正式程序**：据《金融时报》消息人士透露，英国已同意撤销该命令，但尚未正式撤回。英国广播公司（BBC）报道称，苹果尚未收到来自任何政府的正式通知。

#### 背景与争议

*   **《调查权力法案》(IPA)**：今年早些时候，有报道称英国曾援引其《调查权力法案》(IPA)，要求秘密访问全球上传至iCloud的加密用户数据。
*   **苹果的回应**：为维护其安全标准，苹果选择从英国撤回其“高级数据保护”功能，而非妥协。
*   **法律斗争**：英国政府曾试图将案件细节保密，但苹果对英国提起法律上诉，导致内政部无法将所有要求细节完全保密。

#### 苹果的坚定立场

苹果明确表示，宁愿从英国撤回iCloud功能，也不愿损害用户安全。最初这仅限于“高级数据保护”功能，但未来可能导致FaceTime和iMessage等关键功能在该国被移除。

#### 英国的动机与国际压力

*   **目的**：英国希望通过后门访问iCloud数据来打击恐怖主义和调查儿童性虐待。
*   **争议焦点**：英国的命令尤其具有争议性，因为它要求苹果在未经其他国家政府知情的情况下，提供对非英国用户数据的访问权限。正是这一点促使美国向英国政府施压，要求其让步。
*   **IPA的限制**：《调查权力法案》还规定，公司披露此类政府要求属于非法行为。

![iCloud Versus UK Key Feature](https://images.macrumors.com/t/DJt4yhlUGQL70lVg5j2lXcCiu10=/400x0/article-new/2025/02/iCloud-Versus-UK-Key-Feature.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: 英国政府据报道已撤回其要求访问苹果加密iCloud用户数据的争议性命令。美国情报总监图尔西·加巴德证实了这一消息，尽管正式撤回尚未完成。此前，英国援引《调查权力法案》要求秘密访问数据，苹果则以撤回“高级数据保护”功能回应。英国声称此举旨在打击恐怖主义，但其要求访问全球用户数据的做法引发了美国施压，促使英国让步。
items.translated_title: 英国据报道撤回获取加密iCloud用户数据的要求
items.content:
The British government has agreed to withdraw its controversial demand to access Apple users' encrypted iCloud data, according to the U.S. director of intelligence.


Tulsi Gabbard said in a post on X (Twitter) the UK had dropped its plans to force Apple to provide a back door that would have "enabled access to the protected encrypted data of American citizens and encroached on our civil liberties."

According to sources who spoke to the Financial Times, the UK has agreed to rescind the order, but it has yet to be formally withdrawn. The BBC reports that Apple has yet to received any formal communication from either government.

The development follows reports earlier this year that the UK used its Investigatory Powers Act (IPA) to demand secret access to encrypted user data uploaded to iCloud worldwide. Apple responded by removing its Advanced Data Protection feature from the UK rather than compromising its security standards.

The British government had sought to keep details of the case private, but Apple filed a legal appeal against a UK that meant the Home Office couldn't keep all the details of its demand out of the public domain.

Over the past few months, I’ve been working closely with our partners in the UK, alongside @POTUS and @VP, to ensure Americans' private data remains private and our Constitutional rights and civil liberties are protected.

As a result, the UK has agreed to drop its mandate for…

— DNI Tulsi Gabbard (@DNIGabbard) August 19, 2025

Apple made it clear that it would pull ‌iCloud‌ features from the UK rather than compromise its user security, and while that initially only extended to Advanced Data Protection, it could have led to key features like FaceTime and iMessage being removed in the country. The UK wanted backdoor access to ‌iCloud‌ data to fight terrorism and investigate child sex abuse.

The UK's order was particularly controversial as it would have required Apple to provide access to data from users outside the UK without their governments' knowledge – which was what led the U.S. to pressure the UK government to back down. The IPA also makes it illegal for companies to disclose the existence of such government demands.
Tags: Apple Privacy, Apple Security, Encryption, iCloud, United Kingdom
Related Forum: Apple Music, Apple Pay/Card, iCloud, Fitness+

items.title: 下一代Mac Mini的预期 (原标题: What to Expect From the Next Mac Mini)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
### 下一代Mac Mini展望

根据AppleInsider的Marko Zivkovic的发现，下一代Mac Mini预计将搭载M5和M5 Pro芯片。

#### 芯片升级
*   Marko Zivkovic最近发现了一个设备标识符，几乎可以确定是搭载M5芯片的Mac Mini。
*   他上个月也发现了一个潜在的搭载M5 Pro芯片的Mac Mini标识符。
*   尽管当前Mac Mini提供M4和M4 Pro芯片选项，下一代升级到M5和M5 Pro似乎是显而易见的，但值得注意的是，苹果并非定期更新Mac Mini产品线（例如，Mac Mini跳过了M3和M3 Pro芯片）。

#### 设计与特性
*   预计下一代Mac Mini在设计上不会有太多其他变化，因为这款台式电脑已于去年（2024年10月发布）进行了自2010年以来的首次重新设计。
*   当前型号显著小于前代，并配备两个前置USB-C端口，以及针对M4 Pro芯片配置的Thunderbolt 5支持。
*   在美国，当前Mac Mini的起售价为599美元，配置256GB存储和16GB内存。

#### 发布时间
*   最初有传言称首批M5 Mac将于今年晚些时候发布，但最近的报道更倾向于2026年初。

#### 图像
![M4 mini Glowing Teal](https://images.macrumors.com/t/8ycVkSjMtO4msMAaXIfWChQf0xE=/400x0/article-new/2024/10/M4-mini-Glowing-Teal.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: 下一代Mac Mini预计将搭载M5和M5 Pro芯片。尽管芯片升级是预期之中，但Mac Mini的更新周期并不固定。该设备去年已完成重新设计，因此预计外观不会有重大变化。发布时间最初传闻是今年晚些时候，但最新消息指向2026年初。当前型号起售价为599美元。
items.content:
AppleInsider's Marko Zivkovic today said that he has discovered a device identifier for what is "almost certainly" a Mac mini with an M5 chip.


He already discovered an identifier for a potential Mac mini with an M5 Pro chip last month.

All in all, the next Mac mini will be powered by M5 and M5 Pro chips, if he is right.

Given that the current Mac mini can be configured with M4 and M4 Pro chip options, it might sound incredibly obvious that the next model will apparently have M5 and M5 Pro chip options. However, keep in mind that Apple does not always update the Mac mini on a regular basis. For example, the Mac mini skipped the M3 and M3 Pro chips.

The next Mac mini might not have many other changes, as the desktop computer already received its first redesign since 2010 last year. Released in October 2024, the current Mac mini is significantly smaller than the previous model, and it features two front-facing USB-C ports, Thunderbolt 5 support for configurations with the M4 Pro chip, and more. In the U.S., pricing starts at $599 for a model with 256GB of storage and 16GB of RAM.

When will the Mac mini be updated next? It was initially rumored that the first M5 Macs would launch later this year, but more recent reporting has pointed towards early 2026.

items.title: 苹果发布 iOS 26 等操作系统的第四个公开测试版 (原标题: Apple Releases Fourth Public Betas of iOS 26 and More)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
## 苹果发布 iOS 26、iPadOS 26 和 macOS 26 第四个公开测试版

苹果于2025年8月18日发布了 iOS 26、iPadOS 26 和 macOS 26 的第四个公开测试版。这些版本与当天早些时候发布的第七个开发者测试版相对应，旨在让公众在9月正式发布前进行测试。

### 如何下载

已在苹果网站注册的公开测试版用户可以通过以下步骤下载最新版本：
*   打开“设置”或“系统设置”应用。
*   进入“通用”部分。
*   点击“软件更新”。
*   选择 iOS 26、iPadOS 26 或 macOS 26 公开测试版选项。

### iOS 26 和 iPadOS 26 新特性

*   **Liquid Glass 设计**：
    *   视觉美学注重透明度，图标、菜单按钮、导航栏等通过微妙的动画反射和折射光线。
    *   部分区域有弹出菜单，标签栏会缩小，整体外观更圆润。
    ![ios 26 liquid glass lock screen beta 6](https://images.macrumors.com/t/7wiLciB8sm7AZvv6y0i5B91ykJk=/400x0/article-new/2025/08/ios-26-liquid-glass-lock-screen-beta-6.jpg?lossy)
    ![iOS 26 on Three iPhones](https://images.macrumors.com/t/T-wXm4YuRC1oaKVIYmJjg3V5ETg=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/iOS-26-on-Three-iPhones.jpg?lossy)
*   **Apple Intelligence 功能**：
    *   截图的视觉智能（Visual Intelligence）。
    *   钱包应用中的订单跟踪功能更新。
    *   提醒事项（Reminders）新增功能。
    *   信息（Messages）、电话（Phone）和 FaceTime 应用的实时翻译（Live Translation）。
*   **图像游乐场（Image Playground）**：提供类似 ChatGPT 的选项，Genmoji 支持混合两个或更多表情符号以创建新内容。
    ![ten messages features](https://images.macrumors.com/t/9XJY2LSI3OigERIuYd5UE2uE5jo=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/ten-messages-features.jpg?lossy)
*   **空间场景（Spatial Scene）**：使2D照片呈现更强的3D效果。
*   **Safari 浏览器**：导航功能更新。
*   **电话应用**：新增呼叫筛选（Call Screening）和保持协助（Hold Assist）功能，以节省用户时间。
    ![ios 26 call holding](https://images.macrumors.com/t/QtMxGxFPwsU6Mk7q8bN8eKo-Fek=/400x0/article-new/2024/11/ios-26-call-holding.jpg?lossy)
*   **信息应用**：支持自定义背景和投票。
*   **Apple Music**：新增类似DJ的AutoMix功能。
*   **CarPlay**：界面全面 overhauled。
*   **Apple Games 应用**：新增游戏应用。
*   **预览（Preview）**：首次登陆 iPhone。

### macOS Tahoe 新特性

*   **Liquid Glass 设计**：与 iOS 26 相同，并扩展到应用图标、文件夹、Dock、应用内导航、菜单、控制中心和菜单栏。
    ![macos tahoe design](https://images.macrumors.com/t/EdGtm3e2IgVilW3lAR4kmfeM2fs=/400x0/article-new/2025/05/macos-tahoe-design.jpg?lossy)
*   **自定义功能**：控制中心和菜单栏可自定义，文件夹、应用图标和小组件也可自定义。
*   **Safari 浏览器**：标签页设计更新，侧边栏重新设计。
*   **电话应用**：通过 Wi-Fi 通话功能将电话应用引入 Mac，支持呼叫筛选和保持协助功能。
*   **Spotlight**：全面改进，搜索功能增强，并能执行数百项操作而无需打开应用。
*   **游戏应用**：新增游戏应用，带有游戏叠加（Game Overlay）功能。
*   **Metal 4**：开发者可使用 Metal 4。
items.shortSummary: 苹果发布了 iOS 26、iPadOS 26 和 macOS 26 的第四个公开测试版。这些更新引入了全新的“Liquid Glass”设计，注重透明度和圆润外观。主要新功能包括Apple Intelligence（如视觉智能、实时翻译）、Image Playground、电话应用的呼叫筛选和保持协助，以及macOS Tahoe中可自定义的界面和增强的Spotlight。用户现可下载体验这些即将于9月正式发布的系统特性。
items.translated_title: 苹果发布 iOS 26 等操作系统的第四个公开测试版

images.alt: ios 26 liquid glass lock screen beta 6

items.content:
Apple today released the fourth public betas of iOS 26, iPadOS 26, and macOS 26, allowing the public to test the updates ahead of their September launch. The fourth public betas come a week after the third public betas, and the updates correspond with the seventh developer betas that were released earlier today.


Public beta testers that have registered on Apple's website can download the latest iOS 26, iPadOS 26, and macOS 26 public betas by opening the Settings or System Settings app, going to the General section, tapping on Software Update, and choosing the iOS 26, iPadOS 26, or macOS 26 Public Beta options.

iOS 26 and iPadOS 26 feature Apple's Liquid Glass design, with a visual aesthetic that focuses on transparency. Icons, menu buttons, navigation bars, and more reflect and refract light with subtle animations. There are pop-out menus in some areas, tab bars shrink down, and everything has a more rounded look.


There are new Apple Intelligence features like Visual Intelligence for screenshots, updated order tracking in the Wallet app, new features in Reminders, and Live Translation for the Messages, Phone, and FaceTime apps. Image Playground has ChatGPT style options, and Genmoji supports mixing two or more emoji characters to make something new.


2D photos have a more 3D look with a Spatial Scene feature, and Safari has updated navigation. In the Phone app, there are new Call Screening and Hold Assist features that will save you time, while the Messages app supports customizable backgrounds and polls. Apple Music has a DJ-like AutoMix feature, CarPlay has an overhauled interface, there's a new Apple Games app, and Preview has come to the iPhone for the first time.


macOS Tahoe has the same Liquid Glass design as iOS 26, and it extends to app icons, folders, the Dock, in-app navigation, menus, the Control Center, and the Menu Bar. The Control Center and the Menu Bar are customizable, and you're also able to customize folders, app icons, and widgets.


Safari has an updated tab design and a redesigned sidebar, and Apple has brought the Phone app to the Mac for making phone calls through Wi-Fi Calling. The Phone app supports the new Call Screening and Hold Assist features.

Spotlight has been overhauled with improved search and the ability to execute hundreds of actions without opening up an app. There's a new Games app with a Game Overlay feature, and developers have access to Metal 4.

More on what's new can be found in our iOS 26, iPadOS 26, and macOS Tahoe roundups.

items.title: 视频评测：iPhone 16 Pro Max，一年后 (原标题: Video Review: iPhone 16 Pro Max, One Year Later)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
### iPhone 16 Pro Max 一年使用回顾

MacRumors 视频制作人 Dan Barbera 在 iPhone 17 发布前夕，对 iPhone 16 Pro Max 进行了为期一年的回顾。

**耐用性与电池表现：**

*   在过去 11 个月的使用中，iPhone 16 Pro Max 的耐用性和电池续航表现良好，没有出现重大问题。
*   电池健康度保持在 96% 的容量。
*   设备钛金属边框有轻微划痕，但整体外观保持良好。
*   Dan 未使用保护壳，导致背部玻璃因跌落而碎裂，但通过 AppleCare+ 获得了无条件维修。
*   屏幕正面玻璃有较深的划痕。

**性能与散热：**

*   A18 Pro 芯片的性能令人印象深刻。
*   尽管经过软件优化，iPhone 16 Pro Max 在某些情况下仍会发热，尤其是在阳光下屏幕亮度最大或运行 GPU 密集型游戏时。

**相机控制功能：**

*   “相机控制”功能实用性不高，主要用于打开相机应用。
*   意外滑动可能导致设置被更改，这一点令人感到不便。

**未来升级建议：**

*   根据目前的传闻，对于 iPhone 16 Pro Max 用户而言，可能没有充分理由升级到 iPhone 17 Pro Max。
*   然而，对于使用更旧款 iPhone 的用户来说，升级到 iPhone 17 Pro Max 将是值得的。

**与 iPhone 17 Pro 系列相关的传闻：**

*   有传闻称 iPhone 17 Pro 将配备新的蒸汽腔散热系统，有望改善发热问题。
*   iPhone 17 Pro Max 预计将采用铝制边框，背部玻璃用量减少，可能提升耐用性。
*   iPhone 17 系列机型有望获得更好的抗刮擦涂层，改善屏幕划痕问题。
items.shortSummary: MacRumors 对 iPhone 16 Pro Max 进行了一年回顾。该设备在耐用性和电池续航方面表现良好，电池健康度仍有96%。尽管性能出色，但有时仍会发热。钛金属边框有轻微划痕，屏幕有深划痕，背部玻璃曾因跌落而碎裂并已修复。相机控制功能实用性有限。基于现有传闻，iPhone 16 Pro Max 用户可能无需升级到 iPhone 17 Pro Max，但对于旧款 iPhone 用户而言，升级是值得的。iPhone 17 Pro 预计将改进散热、边框材质和屏幕抗刮擦性。
items.translated_title: 视频评测：iPhone 16 Pro Max，一年后
items.content:
We're approaching the iPhone 17 launch, and with less than a month to go, MacRumors videographer Dan Barbera decided to take a look back at his year with the iPhone 16 Pro Max.

Subscribe to the MacRumors YouTube channel for more videos.

The ‌iPhone 16 Pro‌ Max has held up well over the last 11 months, with no major problems with the durability or battery life. Battery health has held up well, and Dan's battery is still at 96 percent capacity.

Even with software optimizations over the last several months, the ‌iPhone 16 Pro‌ Max still runs hot at times. You're most likely to feel it heating up when the display is at max brightness in the sun, or when you're doing something that's demanding like playing a GPU-heavy game. Rumors suggest the iPhone 17 Pro will have a new vapor chamber cooling system, so we might see some improvement with next year's model.

There are minor scratches on the titanium frame of the device, but it otherwise looks good for a year of use. Dan doesn't use a case and shattered the back glass with a drop, but he had a no questions asked repair with AppleCare+. The ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌ Max will have an aluminum frame with less glass on the back, so it could be more durable. The front glass of the iPhone has deep scratches, but there's also a rumor that the ‌iPhone 17‌ models will get a better scratch resistant coating that could improve things.

Camera Control isn't particularly useful except for opening up the Camera app, and it's downright annoying when a setting accidentally gets changed from a mistaken swipe. Performance with the A18 Pro chip has been impressive, and the next ‌iPhone‌ will be even faster.

If you have an ‌iPhone 16 Pro‌ Max, there's probably no reason to upgrade to an ‌iPhone 17 Pro‌ Max based on the rumors we've heard so far, but coming from an older ‌iPhone‌, it'll be worth it. How has your iPhone 16 held up over the last year? Let us know in the comments below.

items.title: iOS 26 Beta 7 中的所有新功能 (原标题: Here's Everything New in iOS 26 Beta 7)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
# iOS 26 Beta 7 新功能概览

苹果已发布 iOS 26 的第七个开发者测试版。尽管已进入 iOS 26 测试周期的后期阶段，此版本仍带来了一些值得注意的变化。

![iOS 26 功能](https://images.macrumors.com/t/EGeEJZAFMuH0j2ywenSgydx6r-w=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/iOS-26-Feature.jpg?lossy)

## 主要更新内容

### 1. 重新设计的血氧功能

*   iOS 26 和 watchOS 26 的第七个开发者测试版中，Apple Watch 的血氧功能进行了重新设计。
*   此更新适用于自 2024 年 1 月中旬以来在美国销售的 Apple Watch Series 9、Apple Watch Series 10 和 Apple Watch Ultra 2 型号。

![Apple Watch Series 6 血氧 LED](https://images.macrumors.com/t/MMk4BNSn7U7UrCs1h4iqnGxCPJQ=/400x0/article-new/2025/08/Apple-Watch-Series-6-Blood-Oxygen-LEDs.jpg?lossy)

### 2. 自适应电源通知

*   iOS 26 引入了 iPhone 上的“自适应电源模式”（Adaptive Power Mode），与现有的“低电量模式”（Low Power Mode）并存。
*   **自适应电源模式功能：** 苹果表示，该模式可在必要时进行“性能调整”以延长 iPhone 电池续航，包括：
    *   略微降低显示屏亮度。
    *   允许某些活动“花费更长时间”。
    *   当 iPhone 剩余电量达到 20% 时，自动开启低电量模式。
*   **Beta 7 新增：** iOS 26 Beta 7 在“设置”应用中的“电池”→“电源模式”下，新增了一个“自适应电源通知”开关。此设置允许用户选择是否在每次自适应电源模式启动时接收推送通知。
*   **兼容性：**
    *   iOS 26 兼容 iPhone 11 系列及更新机型。
    *   自适应电源模式仅适用于 iPhone 15 Pro 型号及更新机型。

![iOS 26 自适应电源通知](https://images.macrumors.com/t/IXDBczUeDJ90S6OvNz8LUR_s5Bk=/400x0/article-new/2025/08/iOS-26-Adaptive-Power-Notifications.jpg?lossy)

### 3. 其他变化

*   修复了一个导致截屏显示较暗的错误。

本文将在发现更多 iOS 26 Beta 7 变化时进行更新。
items.shortSummary: iOS 26 Beta 7 已发布，主要更新包括：重新设计的血氧功能，适用于部分 Apple Watch Series 9/10/Ultra 2 型号。新增“自适应电源模式”，可在必要时调整性能以延长电池续航，并在设置中提供通知开关。此模式仅限 iPhone 15 Pro 及更新机型。此外，修复了截屏显示过暗的错误。

items.content:
The seventh developer beta of iOS 26 is now available. While we are now in the later stages of the iOS 26 beta cycle, there are still some changes.


Below, we outline everything new that we have found in iOS 26 beta 7 so far.

Redesigned Blood Oxygen Feature



The seventh developer betas of iOS 26 and watchOS 26 include a redesigned Blood Oxygen feature on Apple Watch Series 9, Apple Watch Series 10, and Apple Watch Ultra 2 models sold in the U.S. since mid-January 2024.

Adaptive Power Notifications



iOS 26 introduces an Adaptive Power Mode on the iPhone, alongside the existing Low Power Mode.

Apple says Adaptive Power Mode can make "performance adjustments" when necessary to extend an iPhone's battery life, including slightly lowering the display brightness, allowing some activities to "take longer," and automatically turning on Low Power Mode when the iPhone's remaining battery life reaches the 20% mark.

iOS 26 beta 7 adds an additional Adaptive Power Notifications toggle in the Settings app, under Battery → Power Mode. This setting allows you to choose whether you receive push notifications each time Adaptive Power mode kicks in.

iOS 26 is compatible with the iPhone 11 series and newer, but Adaptive Power Mode is only available on the iPhone 15 Pro models and newer.

Other Changes


  • iOS 26 beta 7 fixes a bug that resulted in screenshots having a darker appearance.
This article will be updated if more iOS 26 beta 7 changes are discovered.
